title: Nanbaka 2
opening_song: "Rin! Rin! Hi! Hi!" by Hashiguchikanaderiya (ハシグチカナデリヤ)
ending_song: "Nanbaka Datsugoku Riron♪! (ナンバカ脱獄理論 ♪！)" by Juugo (Yuto Uemura), Uno (Tetsuya Kakihara), Rock (Ire Shiozaki), Nico (Daiki Kobayashi), Hajime Sugoroku (Tomokazu Seki)
sinopse: The second part of Nanbaka. The prisoners and their guards continue their comfortable lives at Nanba Prison. However, from the shadows emerges a new threat: Enki Gokuu, a person from Samon's past, who has mysterious goals of his own.
